summary: This is an email from a Financial Program Specialist at the Federal Bureau of Prisons regarding a procurement issue for fiber cable and camera systems at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. The document contains a standard confidentiality notice.

persons.name: Ms. Garcia
persons.context: Addressed in an email regarding the status of purchase orders for fiber cable and camera systems.

persons.name: Financial Program Specialist
persons.context: Author of the email, works for the United States Department of Justice Federal Bureau of Prisons at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

connections.description: The Financial Program Specialist is communicating a procurement status update to Ms. Garcia.

events.title: Procurement Status Inquiry
events.description: A Financial Program Specialist emails Ms. Garcia about delays in receiving fiber cable needed for camera systems, citing a requirement for additional documentation from the supplier.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional CTR 150 Park Row New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email dated April 1, 2019, concerning a procurement issue at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The email discusses a delay in receiving fiber cable necessary for installing camera systems, with the supplier requiring additional documentation.
The sender is a Financial Program Specialist for the U.S. Department of Justice Federal Bureau of Prisons.
The document includes a standard confidentiality notice regarding sensitive but unclassified information.
